Team

What does it mean to be a part of Green In You?

You will receive support to fuel your professional development. You will own your creations. You will make an impact.

Ways to join

How do you want to contribute to our vision of creating a sustainable fashion community?

Join the Executive Team

Time commitment:

3 months per year (June, July & August)

What you’ll get:

Leadership experience
Certificate & Recommendations
Stipend

Join the Executive Team

Time commitment:

1 month per year (August)

What you’ll get:

Professional work experience
Certificate & Recommendations

Collaborate with us

Think we might be able to work together?
We would love to consider collaborating with you!

How To Join

Interested in joining the Green Team? We’d love to have you onboard!

Email us and let us know you’re interested. Make sure to specify whether you’d like to join the Executive Team, volunteer, or collaborate with us! We’ll get back to you as soon as possible with more information about our positions.

OWN YOUR CREATIONS.

MAKE AN IMPACT.
